[center][font size=4]LFTP Sync Change Log[/font][/center] [b]10/30/2015:[/b] Initial Release.
Container.Name: lftp-sync
Container.Overview: FTP is a sophisticated ftp/http client, and a file transfer program supporting a number of network protocols. Like BASH, it has job control and uses the readline library for input. It has bookmarks, a built-in mirror command, and can transfer several files in parallel. It was designed with reliability in mind. LFTP is free software, distributed under the GNU GPL license.
